description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Cardiology Expert Witness Not Allowed to Testify in Wrongful Death Action
cases.description: The U.S. District Court Southern District of Florida ruled that Plaintiff's Cardiology Expert Witness could not testify on life expectancy in a wrongful death case against a cruise line.

cases.title: Police Procedures Expert Witness Allowed to Testify on Standards of Care
cases.description: A Police Procedures Expert Witness could testify on standards of care, but not offer opinions as to whether those standards were breached.

cases.title: Forensic Engineering Expert Witness Testifies in Slip and Fall Case
cases.description: Plaintiff's Forensic Engineering Expert Witness was allowed to testify on the acceptable height and color of a curb in a slip and fall case.

cases.title: Forensic Psychology Expert Witness' Testimony is Relevant for Insanity Plea
cases.description: The U.S. Appellate Court (9th Circuit) ruled the testimony of a Forensic Psychology Expert Witness was relevant to defendant's insanity defense.
